1. Restoring private key (test curve) based on its topology and hidden added points chain.
Execute:
python restore_private_key.py --curve_mode test --added_points "1,3,4,5,6,7,9,16,17,18,22,23,26,27,31" --verify
Result:
Elliptic curve mode:   test
Last addition (point): 31
Added points (chain):  15
Bits (MSB..LSB):       1000110011000111000000101111101
Private key (int):     1180926333
Verification Q = d*G:  (158984959, 921850458)

2. Restoring private key (legacy curve) based on its topology and hidden added points chain.
Execute:
python restore_private_key.py --curve_mode legacy --added_points "1,2,4,6,7,8,9,13,14,15,18,20,21,22,23,24,27,30,31,32,33,34,35,36,37,39,40,41,42,45,47,49,52,56,57,58,59,60,65,66,69,73,75,80,82,84,85,86,89,91,94,96,97,101,103,104,105,107,109,112,115,118,119,121,122,123,128,130,131,132,133,135,139,141,142,144,145,146,152,155,157,158,159,160,162,163,165,169,170,171,173,174,175,178,181,182,184,185,187,191,192,194,198,204,205,212,214,217,218,220,222,223,224,228,232,233,236,238,239,240,242,244,245,247,250,251,252,256" --verify
Result:
Elliptic curve mode:   legacy
Last addition index:   256
Added points count:    128
Bits (MSB..LSB):       1000111001011010111010011000100011101011001010000001100000100010110001011011001001110111000101101111010010000011101101000101111010000111011001001001010111010001101001010011101010000101000100110000111110001001010100111101111111100100111110100111000111101011
Private key (int):     64389052532870313044990203562685705333461655978490098671693221677551702405611
Verification Q = d*G:  (43320306614497754182924999877303292914242046364787378117605079751353196317227, 75829779628659566944187834059180724147098096663207650979935966790396668484360)

3. Generating data for test curve.
Execute
python generate_data.py --curve_mode test
Result:
Processed: 100000/100000 (100.0%)
Done. Data: ..\key_list_data_20251215153252.csv | Stats: ..\key_list_stats_20251215153252.txt

3. Generating data for legacy curve.
Execute
python generate_data.py --curve_mode legacy
Result:
Processed: 100000/100000 (100.0%)
Done. Data: ..\key_list_data_20251215142747.csv | Stats: ..\key_list_stats_20251215142747.txt
